Teaching
For Fall 2018 I will be teaching Math 171 and Math 305.

Research
My research is in commutative algebra and algebraic geometry.

Advising
Graduate and undergraduate thesis advising.

Algebra, Geometry, Cryptology Seminar
I am a co-organizer for the Algebra, Geometry, Cryptology (AGC) Seminar.

See also the Topology Seminar, the Set Theory Seminar, the Computing Colloquium, and the Mathematics Colloquium.

Events
Research workshops and special sessions at conferences.

Boise Math Teachers' Circle
A community for creative mathematical exploration among peers, mathematics educators, and mathematicians.
